column1: '''Less Can Be More''' is a song written by [[Maury Laws]] (music) and [[Jules Bass]] (lyric) and performed by [[Glenn Yarbrough]] for the [[1980]] animated movie [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'']]. The song is about being happy with the simple things in life.
When you get right down to it?
All my cares come from greed
And it's time that I knew it.
Are the small things that life is all about.
When you get right down to it?
And the love to pursue it.
Are the small things that life is all about.
